chunks.en: In the current environment, it seems like many things aren't as hot as they used to be, and it seems like everyone has lost their enthusiasm â¤ï¸

1. A batch of blogs I followed a few years ago can't be found anymore.
2. Many groups don't have any new messages anymore, everyone seems to have become silent, and even sending borderline suggestive pictures has decreased.
3. The most amazing thing is that there are many "lying flat" (tang ping) bloggers on Bilibili, some even group up to lie flat, and their videos have a lot of views. This phenomenon is really...
Conformity is for self-preservation, solitude is freedom.
I'm the hero when it comes to borderline content. Check out the content crawled by the crawler at https://www.girls-rating.com
The number of people lying down and watching P-site hasn't decreased, so what's the big deal?
Because of AI
Because I'm older and in a different circle
There hasn't been much technological breakthrough, so there's no enthusiasm.

Many of the groups I've joined are still active, including the NGA discount group, the Male Morality Academy, and the NSFW picture group, which are all very active every day. Someone just posted an NSFW picture ğŸ¶
I noticed many 'lying flat' bloggers in 2024, and at that time I noticed Rushan Silver Beach.
Enthusiasm needs to be rewarded to continue, but not posting NSFW pictures is abnormal, very abnormal, I can't understand it.
Incremental development has turned into a stock game, which affects human thoughts and behaviors synchronously. It's not that there are no interesting things, but there is less ambition and passion.

That's right, many people think that what they think is something no one else has thought of, but in reality, everyone is thinking similarly under the same environment. So many coincidental things are happening more and more. For example, I didn't receive many New Year greetings in WeChat groups this year. I usually get endless advertising SMS messages, but I received 0 SMS messages wishing me a Happy New Year.
@echo1937 #6 You're right, I just realized it's already 2025. It seems like I haven't gotten used to the numbers 2024 yet, and it's already passed.
@Suaxi #5 I have a friend, he wants to see what group it is, please send the link.

@xiaocongcong1 #10 This phenomenon too, it seems like many banks and telecom operators used to send birthday SMS messages, but now even birthday SMS messages are gone, and I haven't received any holiday greeting SMS messages during the Spring Festival. I don't know if it's because the environment is bad, or if times have changed.
Economic downturn, real estate downturn, no technological breakthroughs, poor employment situation.
I suggest you join some stock trading groups. From 9:30 to 15:00 every working day, there are so many messages that you don't have time to work, just busy looking at group chats.

chunks.en: What you write will definitely not be as good as what DeepSeek writes. There's no need to write anything now. If you don't believe me, find any topic you're best at, and I'll use DeepSeek to reply to you. Let's see who writes better.

chunks.en: @TWorldIsNButThis I feel that AI has too much influence. 1 person can automatically do the work of N people.
No, no, no, your scope is too small, are you limited to your programmer circle?
I sent a red envelope in the family group during the Chinese New Year, but no one sent one back...
